QuestData.Title: Parental Mastery
QuestData.Description: If them tablets were correct, all ay got ta do is a small dance ritual and the big thing o' the deep will be summoned.$b$bWhen it comes out, we'll get 'em and show me pop we are both true big game hunters like him.
QuestData.RewardText: You saved me son! I canno' ever thank ye enough. Please! Take this fer your efforts.
